verses.verse: <S%H2896>Better<s%> is a <S%H9164>dry<s%> <S%H6595>morsel<s%> and <S%H7962>quietness<s%> with it <S%H4480>Than<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H2077>feasting<s%> with <S%H7379>strife.<s%>

A <S%H5650>servant<s%> who <S%H7919>acts<s%> <S%H7919>wisely<s%> will <S%H4910>rule<s%> over a <S%H1121>son<s%> who <S%H954>acts<s%> <S%H954>shamefully,<s%> And will <S%H2505>share<s%> in the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H251>brothers.<s%>
The <S%H4715>refining<s%> <S%H4715>pot<s%> is for <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H3564>furnace<s%> for <S%H2091>gold,<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H974>tests<s%> <S%H3820>hearts.<s%>
An <S%H7489>evildoer<s%> <S%H7181>listens<s%> to <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H8193>lips,<s%> A <S%H8267>liar<s%> <S%H238>pays<s%> <S%H238>attention<s%> to a <S%H1942>destructive<s%> <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>
He who <S%H3932>mocks<s%> the <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H2778>reproaches<s%> his <S%H6213>Maker;<s%> He who <S%H8056>rejoices<s%> at <S%H343>calamity<s%> will not <S%H5352>go<s%> <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>
<S%H1121>Grandchildren<s%> are the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H2205>men,<s%> And the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> is their fathers.

<S%H3499>Excellent<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> is not <S%H5000>fitting<s%> for a <S%H5036>fool;<s%> <S%H637>Much<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H637>less<s%> are <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> to a <S%H5081>prince.<s%>

A <S%H7810>bribe<s%> is a <S%H68>charm<s%> <S%H2580><s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of its <S%H1167>owner;<s%> <S%H413>Wherever<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H6437>turns,<s%> he <S%H7919>prospers.<s%>

He who <S%H3680>covers<s%> a <S%H6588>transgression<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H160>love,<s%> But he who <S%H8138>repeats<s%> a <S%H1697>matter<s%> <S%H6504>separates<s%> <S%H9017>intimate<s%> <S%H9017>friends.<s%>

A <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> <S%H5181>goes<s%> <S%H5181>deeper<s%> into one who <S%H995>has<s%> <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5221>blows<s%> into a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>
A <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H4805>man<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H9563>evil,<s%> So a <S%H394>cruel<s%> <S%H4397>messenger<s%> will be <S%H7971>sent<s%> against him.
Let a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6298>meet<s%> a <S%H1677>bear<s%> <S%H9599>robbed<s%> of her <S%H9599>cubs,<s%> <S%H408>Rather<s%> than a <S%H3684>fool<s%> in his <S%H200>folly.<s%>
He who <S%H7725>returns<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> for <S%H9186>good,<s%> <S%H9567>Evil<s%> will not <S%H4185>depart<s%> from his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

The <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H4066>strife<s%> is [like] <S%H6362>letting<s%> out <S%H4325>water,<s%> So <S%H5203>abandon<s%> the <S%H7379>quarrel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> it <S%H1566>breaks<s%> out.

He who <S%H6663>justifies<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and he who <S%H7561>condemns<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> <S%H1571>Both<s%> <S%H8147><s%> of them <S%H1571>alike<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H2088><s%> is there a <S%H4242>price<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> to <S%H7069>buy<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> When he <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3820>sense<s%>?
A <S%H7453>friend<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times,<s%> And a <S%H251>brother<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> for <S%H9567>adversity.<s%>

A <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2638>lacking<s%> in <S%H3820>sense<s%> <S%H8628>pledges,<s%> <S%H3709><s%> And <S%H6148>becomes<s%> <S%H6161>surety<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>
He who <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H6588>transgression<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4683>strife;<s%> He who <S%H1361>raises<s%> his <S%H6607>door<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>

He <S%H6141>who<s%> <S%H6141>has<s%> a <S%H6141>crooked<s%> <S%H3820>mind<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H9185>good,<s%> And he who is <S%H2015>perverted<s%> in his <S%H3956>language<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> into <S%H9567>evil.<s%>
He who <S%H3205>begets<s%> a <S%H3684>fool<s%> [does so] to his <S%H8424>sorrow,<s%> And the father of a <S%H1>fool<s%> <S%H5036>has<s%> <S%H8055>no<s%> <S%H3808>joy.<s%>
A <S%H8056>joyful<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3190>good<s%> <S%H1456>medicine,<s%> But a <S%H5218>broken<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3001>dries<s%> up the <S%H1634>bones.<s%>
A <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> <S%H3947>receives<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> from the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> To <S%H5186>pervert<s%> the <S%H734>ways<s%> of <S%H4941>justice.<s%>

<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> is in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the one who <S%H995>has<s%> <S%H995>understanding,<s%> But the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> are on the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
A <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> is a <S%H3708>grief<s%> to his father, And <S%H1>bitterness<s%> to her who <S%H4470>bore<s%> him.
It is <S%H1571>also<s%> not <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H6064>fine<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> [Nor] to <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H5081>noble<s%> for [their] <S%H3476>uprightness.<s%>

He who <S%H2820>restrains<s%> his <S%H561>words<s%> <S%H3045>has<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> And he <S%H7119>who<s%> has a <S%H7119>cool<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>

<S%H1571>Even<s%> a <S%H191>fool,<s%> when he <S%H2790>keeps<s%> <S%H2790>silent,<s%> is <S%H2803>considered<s%> <S%H2450>wise;<s%> When he <S%H331>closes<s%> his <S%H8193>lips,<s%> he is [counted] <S%H995>prudent.<s%>
